script:
Armand Junior Notue is a data scientist with extensive experience in machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing (NLP), and AI. He specializes in developing real-time AI solutions, deploying ML pipelines, and optimizing predictive models to drive business impact. His key skills include proficiency in various machine learning techniques such as supervised and unsupervised learning, reinforcement learning, and the use of advanced algorithms like XGBoost, BERT, GPT, T5, RNNs, CNNs, LSTMs, and GANs. He is also skilled in NLP tasks including named entity recognition, sentiment analysis, text summarization, speech-to-text conversion, and word embeddings.

Notue's experience spans multiple roles, including a data scientist at Outlier where he optimized AI models to improve accuracy by 15%, and an intern at African Think Tank, where he led data collection and survey analysis, increasing program effectiveness by 30%. His projects highlight his capability in transforming complex challenges into practical solutions. For instance, he built a transformer-based NLP model for sentiment analysis that achieved 88.3% accuracy, improved job market insights platforms with NLP models to increase hiring strategy efficacy, developed a real-time fraud detection system that enhanced fraud detection by 35%, and implemented time series forecasting models to optimize retail sales forecasting. Notue has also demonstrated his ability in custom neural network implementation from scratch and advanced feature engineering techniques. His professional affiliations include the American Statistical Association, IEEE Computer Society, and the Association for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence.
